Class: Grouping

insight. Grouping

insight.Grouping

new insight.Grouping(dimension)

mda/Grouping.js, line 7
A Grouping is generated on a dimension, to reduce the items in the data set into groups along the provided dimension
Name Type Description
dimension Dimension The dimension to group

Methods

#this.count(){string[]}

mda/Grouping.js, line 421
Returns the array of properties whose distinct value occurences will be counted during the reduction of this Grouping
Returns:
The list of property names whose values will be counted

#this.count(properties){this}

mda/Grouping.js, line 421
Sets the array of properties whose distinct value occurences will be counted during the reduction of this Grouping
Name Type Description
properties string[] An array of properties whose distinct value occurences will be counted during the reduction of this Grouping

#this.cumulative(){string[]}

mda/Grouping.js, line 401
Returns the list of properties that will be cumulatively summed over this Grouping
Returns:
The list of property names that will be cumulatively summed

#this.cumulative(properties){this}

mda/Grouping.js, line 401
Sets the list of properties that will be cumulatively summed over this Grouping
Name Type Description
properties string[] An array of property names to be cumulatively summed over slices in this Grouping.

#this.getData(){object[]}

mda/Grouping.js, line 554
This method is used to return the group's data, without ordering. It checks if there is any filtering requested and applies the filter to the return array.
Returns:
- The grouping's data in an object array, with an object per slice of the dimension.

#this.mean(){string[]}

mda/Grouping.js, line 441
Returns the array of properties whose mean will be calculated after the map reduce of this Grouping.
Returns:
The list of property names that will averaged

#this.mean(properties){this}

mda/Grouping.js, line 441
Sets the array of properties whose mean will be calculated after the map reduce of this Grouping.
Name Type Description
properties string[] An array of properties that will be averaged after the map reduce of this Grouping.

#this.ordered(){boolean}

mda/Grouping.js, line 485
Gets or sets whether the group's data is ordered.

#this.ordered(ordered){this}

mda/Grouping.js, line 485
Sets if this Grouping will be ordered or not
Name Type Description
ordered boolean Whether to order this Grouping or not

#this.orderFunction(){function}

mda/Grouping.js, line 464
Gets or sets the function used to compare the elements in this grouping if sorting is requested.
Returns:
- The function used to compare two values when sort() is called on an array

#this.orderFunction(function){this}

mda/Grouping.js, line 464
Sets the function used to compare the elements in this grouping if sorting is requested.
Name Type Description
function function The comparison function to be used to sort the elements in this group. The function should take the form of a standard Javascript comparison function.

#this.postAggregation(){function}

mda/Grouping.js, line 361
Gets the function that will run after the map reduce stage of this Grouping's aggregation. This is an empty function by default, and can be overriden by the setter.
Returns:
The function that will run after aggregation of this Grouping.

#this.postAggregation(postAggregationFunc){this}

mda/Grouping.js, line 361
Sets the function that will run after any aggregation has been performed on this Grouping.
Name Type Description
postAggregationFunc string[] A user defined function of the form function(grouping), that the Grouping will run post aggregation.

#this.recalculate()

mda/Grouping.js, line 515
This method is called when any post aggregation calculations need to be recalculated. For example, calculating group percentages after totals have been created during map-reduce.

#this.sum(){string[]}

mda/Grouping.js, line 381
Returns the list of properties to be summed on this Grouping
Returns:
The list of property names that will be summed

#this.sum(properties){this}

mda/Grouping.js, line 381
Sets the list of property names that will be summed in this Grouping
Name Type Description
properties string[] An array of property names to be summed for slices in this Grouping.
